page.title: 08MAY DAY SPECTACULAR
page.content: On May 6th it was the May Day Spectacular.I woke up at 8:00.At 8:15 I got dressed and washed.Then at 8:30 I had my breakfast.At 8:40 I put my shoes on and brushed my hair,and then at 8:50 we set off.Peter Levy from Radio Aire came to commentate the Its a Knockout.The contestents were St.Annes Venture Scouts,St.Johns Venture Scouts and the Boys Brigade.There were all sorts of games and stalls there.There was a caravan for all the helpers to get a drink.My teacher Mr.Cameron helped in the Its a Knockout.It started at 1:00 and finished at 4:00.I went in for the fancy dress as Max Wall.Ted Pickles came and did a Punch and Judy.The Majorettes came to do a march.It was held in Wrenthorpe Park.At the end we cleared up the rubbish.Â£1,200 was raised to build a new village hall.
